scripts.all: pnpm -r build:dist && pnpm -r build:types && pnpm -r test:coverage && pnpm -r dev:run && pnpm -r test:rust && pnpm -r typecheck && pnpm -r lint:check && pnpm -r lint:deps && pnpm -r lint:package && pnpm -r build:app && pnpm -r generate:docs && pnpm -r build:rust && pnpm -r build:wasm
scripts.all:clean: bun clean && pnpm i && bun allz
scripts.allz: pnpm i && bun lint && bun sort-package-json && bun all
scripts.build: pnpm -r build:dist && pnpm -r build:app && pnpm -r build:types && pnpm -r build:zig && pnpm -r build:wasm
scripts.build:wasm: zig build wasm && mkdir -p ../dist && find ../.zig-cache -name "*.wasm" -exec cp {} ../dist/zigevm.wasm \; && echo "WASM build completed" && echo "WASM size: $(ls -lh ../dist/zigevm.wasm | awk '{print $5}')" && echo "WASM path: $(realpath ../dist/zigevm.wasm)"
scripts.release:publish: pnpm install && pnpm -r build:app && pnpm -r build:dist && pnpm -r build:types && cd bundler-packages/resolutions-rs && bun run build:release && cd ../../ && changeset publish
scripts.sort-package-json: sort-package-json package.json apps/*/package.json bundler-packages/*/package.json configs/*/package.json examples/*/package.json experimental/*/package.json extensions/*/package.json packages/*/package.json tevm/package.json
scripts.sort-package-json:check: sort-package-json package.json docs/package.json configs/*/package.json examples/*/package.json experimental/*/package.json extensions/*/package.json packages/*/package.json && git diff --exit-code tevm/package.json
